channel.title: About BookWyrm
channel.description:
Social Reading and Reviewing
[BookWyrm](https://bookwyrm.social) is a platform for social reading! You can use it to track what you're reading, review books, and follow your friends. It isn't primarily meant for cataloguing or as a data-source for books, but it does do both of those things to some degree.
**Development**: https://github.com/bookwyrm-social **Documentation**: https://docs.joinbookwyrm.com/ **Matrix**: https://matrix.to/#/#bookwyrm:matrix.org

item.title: About BookWyrm
item.dc:creator: mouse
item.description:
Social Reading and Reviewing

BookWyrm is a platform for social reading! You can use it to track what you’re reading, review books, and follow your friends. It isn’t primarily meant for cataloguing or as a data-source for books, but it does do both of those things to some degree.

Development: BookWyrm · GitHub
Documentation: https://docs.joinbookwyrm.com/
Matrix: https://matrix.to/#/#bookwyrm:matrix.org
